title: Upgrade Metrics library to 3.2.2
description: In addition to some bug fixes this release contains one important improvement - support for thread-safe custom metric instantiators when using short-hand MetricRegistry.counter(...) and friends. This support is needed for addressing the problem in SOLR-10262.
